post_saving_error: An error occurred during post saving
post_deleting_error: An error occurred during post deleting
select_sections_num: You can select up to %s sections
post_use_pagebreak: Use <!-- pagebreak --&gt to separate preface and rest of text, in order to show preface in the list of posts, instead of automatic truncating of content. Very long preface will be truncated automatically.
post_adding_error: An error occurred during post adding
section_path_info: This option allow to specify path, that will be in URL for this section (if empty - will be filled automatically)
sure_to_delete_post: Are you sure want to delete post %s?
sure_to_delete_posts_section: Are you sure want to delete posts section %s?
posts_per_page_info: Number of posts, which will be displayed on one page
maximum_number_of_sections_for_post: Maximum number of sections for post
maximum_number_of_sections_for_post_info: Every post can be associated with several sections. This parameter specifies the maximum number of such sections.
enable_comments_info: Allows to enable or disable posts comments, depends on Comments module
new_posts_only_from_admins_info: Only administrators are able to write new posts. Otherwise any registered user can write new post.
allow_iframes_without_content_info: For example, allows to insert video from youtube
